title: Louisbourg
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Albert Kish
brief_description: Shows the restoration of the Fortress of Louisbourg on Cape Breton Island. The fort, originally built by King Louis XV to protect French possessions in the French Colonial era, is considered to be the largest historical site and dig in North America. A methodological film showing techniques of research involved in reconstructing some of the main buildings.
